title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, September 18, 2013
byline: David Brancaccio, Shannon Mullen, Paddy Hirsch, Amy Scott, Bruce Johnson, Alexandra Starr and David Weinberg
description: Wednesday afternoon, we will learn just how much the Federal Reserve has decided to scale back on stimulus spending. The vulnerability of social security numbers -- the simple nine-digit code that holds so much of our private information. And lists, lists, lists. Why is the media obsessed with lists? We read off a list to explain. Just kidding, of course.
